question: When did Limoges receive the label "City of Art and History"?
asked_question_translated: Hvornår fik Limoges prædikatet "kunstens og historiens by"?
answer: Limoges fik prædikatet "kunstens og historiens by" i 2008.
answer_translated_eng: Limoges was labelled 'City of Art and History' in 2008.
